articles.author: Danny Halpin
articles.title: Atlantic Ocean current could collapse much sooner than thought, study suggests - Yahoo Sport Australia
articles.description: The climate system that keeps the northern hemisphere mild and wet could collapse this century, it said, though the results are far from certain.
articles.content:
A collapse of this current would have disastrous effects on ecosystems and peoples ability to grow food, experts said (Henrik Egede-Lassen/Zoomedia/PA)
